title: HP focuses on creators with new ZBook mobile workstations
content:
Today, HP is announcing all new products from its Z lineup, including some ZBooks, some monitors, and even the HP Thunderbolt Dock G4. Specifically, the two new laptops are the ZBook Studio G9 and the ZBook Fury G9. â€œCreative professionals want personalized hardware and software experiences that provide them the freedom to pursue their passions

The post HP focuses on creators with new ZBook mobile workstations appeared first on XDA.
description: HP is announcing new ZBook mobile workstations, along with some new monitors, a new Thunderbolt dock, and more.
